He’s still requesting donations, for a project we don’t even know exist.
[/quote]

Are pictures not enough for you?..

I’ll be expecting an apology from you all in the future.[/quote]

Dude, fuck you. You should be apologizing to Travis and the moparscape staff for polluting their site with this smut. You’re fucking lucky, you know that? You have little to no right to be asking for support or a fucking apology from the community. That comment just blows me away.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

[quote=“RSVault, post:58, topic:437773”][quote author=Demon6994 link=topic=540475.msg3960393#msg3960393 date=1333228151]

He’s still requesting donations, for a project we don’t even know exist.

Are pictures not enough for you?..

I’ll be expecting an apology from you all in the future.

I shall not apologize since you’re scamming people out of money to play a game no one else can even play. Bro. Like everyone said, you are working on something, woo, you have pictures, what does that prove? You can code. OMG I CAN TOO! Bro, I like the fact you’re working on something like this, But I will not apologize for you’re forcing people to pay to play before you even release it. That’s what is going to tear your community to pieces.

<img=trollface.jpg> >.>

[/quote]

If this were a scam, I wouldn’t have 9 developers, and I wouldn’t be working on the server as much as I am as well as the rest of the team. Think about it.[/quote]
From your website

In the end, we decided a couple things. Firstly, we decided that Pre-Alpha will have limited, yet near-perfected content. In Pre-Alpha, you can expect the following content:

Combat
Woodcutting
Firemaking
Fishing
Cooking
Mining
Smithing
Possibly one or two minigames
Some miscellaneous content

You guys must really eat shit at coding some basic content. Seriously? An an entire year, with an ass load of developers, you’ve got hardly anything to show for it. If that’s all you have that you’re confident in players using, I’m disappoint.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

From your site:

In Other News…
We have hired a new professional content developer who will be announced sometime in the near future.

So, the other 9 people that you have working for you are? They’re clearly not professional, and you really don’t have many skills added whatsoever. Shit, Deathfire and I, whilst fucking around for hours while doing skills, still had much more than this added in a month. Sure, we delayed pre-alpha for like a week and got bitched at, but we did release something people could play on. You’ve delayed it for about 4 months and still have people riding your dick to play. You better hope that you have the most accurate content added, or you’re fuckin’ done on the release. People just don’t wait for a year to play something that is full of bugs, they expect you not to fuck up.

Remember, keep it classy Vault, keep it classy.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Secondly, we decided that Pre-Alpha will be longer than one month. The main reason for why that is, is because we will be dishing out "groups" of content weekly for thorough testing of everything we've made up to this point. For example, the first week or two, the content listed above will be available. The week after, another "wave" or "group" of content will be released. This will continue until all content we currently have is tested to a point where we believe Alpha will be ready.

Lastly, and probably most importantly for you all, we decided that Pre-Alpha should be out in either April or May. We don’t want to give out an exact date so that we don’t disappoint you, but we have given you two months to look forward to.

Bullshit.

If you’re releasing constant content that’s not an alpha, thats not a normal testing stage and people shouldn’t have to pay to play. This really pisses me off and I’m posting this in the staff section.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:41, topic:437773”][quote author=Demon6994 link=topic=540475.msg3960278#msg3960278 date=1333220170]

Knowing your record, id say its a scam.

Who cares. Let him scam people. It’s every ones fault for ‘donating’ to something we know doesn’t exist. Since he can’t post links about it, which gives us more of a reason to believe it’s a scam. >.>
[/quote]
Somebody takes your money that you donated for a good cause and spends it on himself. That’s incredibly unethical.

I love how you promise a stability test and then never have one, are you deliberately trying to piss of your community? You wait for the last possible day in March to post an update relevant to the “Behind the Scenes March” and it says that you aren’t doing the stability test and their is no news of the “surprise.” You’re a criminal Vault, simple as that.

No idea why the moderators are even allowing this project thread.[/quote]

I am still wondering that myself dude. Why would the mods of Moparscape not lock this for someone who is scamming. RSVault has a history for scamming, and I don’t believe that this project is even real. I lean more to the fact that it’s fake, and he just wants money for his own personal uses, that doesn’t even involve this server at all. Now… Taking into consideration, if he UPDATED us more on it, and SHOWED PROOF he was doing something, then maybe it would slide, but he isn’t even updating you on anything really. Just taking your money, and blowing it off on whatever he needs. He should save up and buy a life.

Read full topic
